revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_PotteryChooseBit}} '''A_PotteryChooseBit'''
Sets the calling actor in a state randomly chosen among Death+1, Death+3, Death+5, Death+7, and Death+9. Additionally, it replaces the duration of this state by one chosen randomly between 256 and 384 tics.
This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|PotteryBit}} and derived classes.
{{DEFAULTSORT:PotteryChooseBit}}[[Category:Decorate Status change functions]] [[Category:Decorate Hexen functions]] [[Category:Decorate Restricted functions]]
